# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.4.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.4.x | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Security related issues should be kept private until the team has had a chance to address them, so please do not publish them to the Issue Tracker or anywhere public.

To report a security related issue, please open a [Draft Security Advisory](https://github.com/revelryengine/platform/security/advisories/new).
